title: About
content:
When was the last time you changed your password?


If you're honest with yourself, it was probably a long time ago.



We get it. You're busy.



Thats why we've taken it upon ourselves to remind you.



We send our subscribers an email every 90 days to remind them that they
really should change that password that they've been using for 5 years.



It's as simple as that.



Sign up. Get reminded. Stay secure.
